title: How can I check my total play time and stuff
body: I wanna cry about spending so much time on one champion and the rework making that champion suck and how it depresses me.

replies.body: The client doesn't currently offer this, but it's a cool suggestion if you'd like to suggest it over to our devs on the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  In the meantime, you could find some third party sites with details (though keep in mind they might not be entirely accurate).
